section.heading: (Formerly Sec. 17-186). Escort of female patients to hospital

content.p: Sec. 17a-505. (Formerly Sec. 17-186). Escort of female patients to hospital.When any female with psychiatric disabilities is escorted to a state hospital for persons with psychiatric disabilities by a male guard, attendant or other employee of a correctional or reformatory institution, or by a male law enforcement officer, under the provisions of sections17a-75to17a-83, inclusive,17a-450to17a-483, inclusive,17a-495to17a-528, inclusive,17a-540to17a-550, inclusive,17a-560to17a-575, inclusive, and17a-615to17a-618, inclusive, the person so escorting her shall be accompanied by an adult member of her family or at least one woman.
